title: Pathfinding Visualizer
description: Developed a shortest path visualizer by implementing  BFS, DFS, Dijkstra, and A* algorithms.

title: Notes App
description: Developed a notes app that allows users to write and store their notes using localhost, ensuring easy access and secure storage on their local machine.

title: Tenzy Game
description: Created a Tenzy game using React to help kids learn about numbers by matching similar ones. This interactive game enhances numerical recognition and memory skills.
